title: The Wizard of Waterdeep
content:
Sorcerous Sundries vault. It sounds like the vault is protected by some invisible means. We should tread carefully.

Find 'The Annals of Karsus' in the Sorcerous Sundries vaults.

We found a strange note in the vaults of Sorcerous Sundries, purportedly written by the great wizard Ramazith himself. It seems to refer to the names of the doors guarding each vault. We found a note in Tolna's office regarding the Sorcerous Sundries vault. It sounds like the vault is protected by some invisible means
